devdoc.details: A comprehensive donation platform with campaigns, goals, and transparent tracking

cancelCampaign(uint256).details: Cancel campaign (only creator, only if no donations)

params._beneficiary: Address that will receive the donations

params._campaignId: ID of the campaign to donate to

getActiveCampaigns(uint256,uint256).details: Get active campaigns (view function for frontend)

getUserCampaigns(address).details: Get campaigns created by a user

getUserDonations(address).details: Get campaigns a user has donated to

isCampaignExpired(uint256).details: Check if campaign deadline has passed

devdoc.title: DonationApp
